TopicTitle: Merge only loads part of a craft

Articles.Content:
Hi all,

I tried Merge for the first time today in order to put the cargo in my Ares V for my constellation rebuild and all it does is load in part of the craft..

Is this a known issue with merge?

Also, I have constant KSP crashes that also crash my PC, corrupting my save file. It has happened twice now.. Anyway I start a new thread for that but I cant find a free website to upload my many crash logs. Any ideas?

MJ

Dropbox offers free accounts and enough storage for even the most crash prone pilots

As for merge, not seen that yet, can you also upload the craft in question?
